## Data Source
Name of the service/API you'd like to see supported.

## Description
What does this service provide? Why would it be useful?

## API Information
- API Documentation: [link if available]
- Authentication: [API key, OAuth, none, etc.]
- Rate Limits: [if known]

## Proposed Tools
What operations should this connector support?

- [ ] Search
- [ ] Get by ID
- [ ] List
- [ ] Other: ___

## Use Cases
How would you use this connector?

## Willingness to Contribute
- [ ] I'm willing to help implement this connector
- [ ] I can help test this connector
- [ ] I can provide API access for testing
